0: AN ACT CONVERTING BARANGAY DUMABEL, BARANGAY SAN LEONARDO, BARANGAY PINARIPAD NORTE, AND BARANGAY PINARIPAD SUR, ALL LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF AGLIPAY, PROVINCE OF QUIRINO INTO THE FREEPORT AREA OF QUIRINO (FAQ) INTO A SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE AND FREEPORT, CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE AUTHORITY OF THE FREEPORT AREA OF QUIRINO (AFAQ), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06472
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONVERTING BARANGAY DUMABEL, BARANGAY SAN LEONARDO, BARANGAY PINARIPAD NORTE, AND BARANGAY PINARIPAD SUR, ALL LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF AGLIPAY, PROVINCE OF QUIRINO INTO THE FREEPORT AREA OF QUIRINO (FAQ) INTO A SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE AND FREEPORT, CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE AUTHORITY OF THE FREEPORT AREA OF QUIRINO (AFAQ), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
